The Heroine of the otome game, “A Bouquet For A Beautiful World” is “Linaria”, a girl of common birth who had unusual “silver hair” and “amethyst eyes”.

In possession of a rare magical power since she was born, she would be obligated to attend the Royal Magic Academy, “Calumia”… however: 

She had a serious problem as a Heroine.>
